***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
Borrowed from Sanskrit परम (parama, “greatest”) + प्रभु (prabhu, “lord”).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [pəɾəmpɾəbʱu]
**** Noun[edit] ****
परमप्रभु • (paramprabhu) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐥𑐬𑐩𑐥𑑂𑐬𑐨𑐸)
   1. God
